Title: mapContainsKeyLike
Description: map — Map. Map.pattern  - String pattern to match.
1 if map contains key like specified pattern, 0 if not.
Examples: CREATE TABLE tab (a Map(String, String)) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO tab VALUES ({'abc':'abc','def':'def'}), ({'hij':'hij','klm':'klm'});SELECT mapContainsKeyLike(a, 'a%') FROM tab;
